Email Address Validation

## Install

```{r eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_github("ropenscilabs/addressable@main")
```

```{r}
library("addressable")
```

## Address

```{r}
x <- Address$new("User+tag@example.com")
x$host$host_name
x$local$local
x$valid()
x$fail()
```

```{r}
x <- Address$new("user1")
x$valid()
x$fail()
```
